title: Broken images in email body - Thunderbird / android
creator: cornettej
content: I have a daily email that shows me images of my incoming mail pieces. However, in Thunderbird for Android, the images are always broken. I can't figure out settings to correct. Feature works fine on a different mail client. Anyone got any clues?
